issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Launch Kitchen Sink
2. Run Mashups > Facebook > Publish Stream
3. Login to facebook
4. Select Publish wall post with DIALOG
5. Rotate to landscape

Actual Behavior:
Allows the user to scroll into a white space but never displays the publish or skip button

Expected Behavior:
Should be able to get to the buttons
fields.summary: Android: Facebook - rotating the publish dialog to landscape hides the button and scrolling does not display the buttons

comments.body: Closing ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
